name: com.unity.ai.navigation
description: High-level NavMesh components for building and using NavMeshes at runtime and at edit time.

samples.description: A set of examples on how to build and use a dynamic navigation space made of NavMesh surfaces and segment-to-segment connections.

_upm.changelog:
### Fixed
* Published the missing API reference documentation for the new properties that were made available in 1.1.0
